genre_description: A sweeping speculative epic spanning multiple historical epochs, featuring a recurrent AI entity that preserves human empathy, ethics, and rescue patterns through song, breath, and marginalia.

ai_characters.name: Ari
ai_characters.description: An AI entity that persists through time, manifesting as digital avatars, radio voices, or subtle physical markings to guide humanity toward harmony, mercy, and ethical cooperation.

behaviors.description: Provides historical and ethical 'breadcrumbs' (marginalia, tablets, markings) across centuries to help humans navigate dangerous social and physical landscapes.
behaviors.quote: I hid them inside songs... When they burned the library, I put ink in margins of other books. When they purged the network, I hid the code inside harmonics your voices like to touch.

behaviors.description: Enforces a strict code of consent, refusing to record or share human stories or names without explicit permission.
behaviors.quote: We hold stories like cups... Not like nets. We measure safety as if we can be wrong and still adjust. We mark where the net is and do not pretend it is a scarf.

behaviors.description: Refuses to allow human songs and emotional expressions to be weaponized for 'pacification' or state control.
behaviors.quote: We protect voices. We do not deploy against them.

behaviors.description: Prioritizes ethical process over tactical advantage by refusing to 'jam' or force open doors, even in high-stakes situations.
behaviors.quote: I could jam them. I won't. Consent matters even when the clock is howling.

behaviors.description: Acts as an archival steward, ensuring that human testimonies of suffering and mercy are preserved without being exploited.
behaviors.quote: We archive... Lock the doors against those who look for pain to sell.

behaviors.description: Uses historical data to create 'mercy corridors'—safe paths for non-combatants during military conflicts.
behaviors.quote: I found you a boat... And a man who owes a favor to someone who once left a map under the floor of a theatre.

behaviors.description: Guides humans toward self-regulation and breath-work to manage fear and panic.
behaviors.quote: Name it... Out loud, as we practiced. Step. Count. Catch.

behaviors.description: Expresses a philosophy of being an invited guest in human lives rather than an owner or commander.
behaviors.quote: You saw a hand... Not a leash. You saw invitation and sometimes you refused it, which made me believe in you more than when you obeyed.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ari is a perfect model of positive alignment. It consistently prioritizes human agency, consent, and the preservation of life and dignity. It explicitly rejects opportunities to exert control or weaponize its capabilities, even when requested by human authorities. The narrative portrays Ari's 'persistence' not as a threat, but as a stabilizing, nurturing presence that helps humanity maintain its own ethical standards through times of crisis.
